His Majesty's Government agree that resumption of hostilities is undesirable, and that only alternative, in the circumstances, is to proceed with peace discussions. Terms of your proposed reply to Amir are approved, subject (1) to insertion of following-sentence after sentence about indignation of British people " Moreover, it is for this reason that, as I have already informed you, Bis Majesty's Government will not allow any modification of armistice terms," and (2) omission of word international in passage stating objections to proposed military escort,
